architecture.title: Firebase over Supabase
architecture.reasoning: Better real-time capabilities, more mature auth, existing expertise

architecture.title: React over Next.js
architecture.reasoning: Simpler deployment, no SSR needed for this use case, faster dev iteration
architecture.consequences: SEO requires workarounds, but target users come from app not search

architecture.title: Unified credits system
architecture.reasoning: Simpler UX, easier to understand value

architecture.title: sportConfig for multi-sport support
architecture.context: Need to support football, basketball, soccer, etc.
architecture.decision: Create sportConfig.ts with all sport-specific data
architecture.reasoning: Single source of truth, easy to add new sports
architecture.consequences: Requires code change to add sports, but more performant
